name: Gust of Wind
text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with his or her Active Pokémon.

effect.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with his or her Active Pokémon.

strengths: Target weak or damaged Pokemon for KO
weaknesses: Requires opponent to have Benched Pokemon
synergies: High damage attackers - KO weak targets
Targeting Pokemon with high retreat cost

competitiveHistory: Gust of Wind was one of the most powerful control cards, allowing players to pick off damaged or key Pokemon from the Bench.

rulings.ruling: You choose which of your opponent's Benched Pokemon becomes Active.
The former Active Pokemon goes to the Bench.
You cannot use Gust of Wind if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon.
